crazyballrun.game.level.effects

Class ExternalForce

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.level.effects.ObjectEffect
      • crazyballrun.game.level.effects.ExternalForce

  • public class ExternalForce
extends ObjectEffect
    ExternalForce is an implementation of ObjectEffect and generates external forces uppon a LevelObject for a period of time.
